testcase.name: Veryfying Adactin Cancel Booking
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the adactin page...........................................passed When User should perform login "Velumani","Mine@123#".......................passed Then User should verify after login "Hello Velumani!".......................passed And User should enter details in Search Hotel "London","Hotel Creek","Standard","2 - Two","25/08/2022","28/08/2022","1 - One" and "0 - None".passed Then User should verify after Select Hotel page msg "Select Hotel".........passed And User should selct hotel and click continue..............................passed Then User should verify after continue "Book A Hotel".......................passed And User should perform book hotel "Velumani","Devendiran" and "Chennai OMR 119".passed Then User should verify after click book now msg "Booking Confirmation".....passed And User should cancel booking with generated order id......................passed Then User should Verify after Cancel selected "The booking has been cancelled.".passed
